  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600

    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584

  LayoutBlockFlow (floating) {DIV} at (0,0) size 153.55x100 [border: (10px solid #FF0000)]

        LayoutInline {SPAN} at (0,0) size 0x0

      LayoutText {#text} at (92,0) size 6x14
        text run at (92,0) width 6: "x"
